Recomendado

Portal is most definitely a grand staple in gaming history, and for great reason too!
From the moment you boot up the game, you are surrounded in an eerie, somewhat digitally broken ambiance that immediately sets the underlying tone of the game. The mechanics are simply taught and are easy to get the hang of, and mastery of portals combined with speedrun tactics makes this game play as beautifully as its story. 
Speaking of the story! This game has some of the funniest and most memorable lines in history, and its only from one devilishly lovely villain! The combined cleanliness of a dystopia-like facility, the fantastic progression and challenge, the lovely and charmingly dry humor, it all coalesces into a absolutely fantastic game!
If there is a few real nitpicks I can make about this game, and only if ABSOLUTELY HAD TO, would be:
A: How the camera does that slow-shift to readjust for when you flip upside-down. It gets really nauseating and annoying after a while.
B: By now, it's a pretty graphically dated game. But that's not so much of a downer for me!
 
"All in all, it's a fantastic game, an absolute must-play for any gamer, and a downright perfect game!"
9.5/10

[h1] Portal [/h1]

Portal bir platform oyunu ve oynadığım oyunlar arasından gerçekten çok hoşuma giden bir oyun oldu. Portal 2 isimli bir devam oyunu daha var ve bu iki oyun gerçekten sudan ucuz. İki oyunun toplam fiyatı 36 TL civarı olması gerek ancak indirimleri beklerseniz 3,70+3,70=7,40 TL fiyatına bile düşebiliyor ve bu gerçekten çok ucuz. Canınız sıkıldı ve kaliteli vakit geçirmek istiyorsanız kesinlikle Portal'ı oynamanızı öneririm. Oyunun oynanış süresine gelecek olursa şahsen ben 3 saatte bitirdim ve gerçekten kısa bir süre :/ Onun dışında hafif beyin yaksa da gerçekten çok ama çok hoş bir oyun. Kesinlikle alın deneyimleyin.

[b] 1.Oyun: Portal [/b]
2.Oyun: Portal 2

buenisimo

i played portal 1 after I beat it's sequel (which was an amazing experience) , and i must say portal 2 is undoubtedly a better game in every way possible. but still portal 1 had to be made in the first place for developers to figure how they can improve the game tremendously from every perspective to create a masterpiece which is portal 2. still portal 1 is a great game (beats the majority of modern puzzle games in creativity , originality and other perspectives) i enjoyed it a lot and i'm sure that so will you (assuming you haven't played it yet) the story was really short obviously, and for me who played portal 2 first , most puzzles weren't challenging in slightest, some of them required a little bit of thinking hard , but for the most part it was a walk in the park, so make sure you play this first.
portal 1 is a revolutionary game, and it always remains one of valve's best games ever made

great classic puzzle game, picked it up on sale and was really not expecting it to be as good as it was. went in completely blind, so everything, including the final part of the game, was new and surprising to me. the puzzles are not too easy, but not so difficult that you can't figure them out with some work. only issue is that I wish it was a little bit longer. will definitely be playing Portal 2.
